name: Colored Runner
description:
Colored runner is a prototype from a one button game concept ! So u can play this game by pressing only one button at a time ! 

  ↓↓ In the game you are this cute little rectangle down here ↓↓ 

                                                        

  As long as the game run ur character will move on the right automatically. Your goal is to reach the blue door avoiding obstacles.

  When you are near an obstacle u enter his area, which means you can destroy it by pressing the right button.

  You can complete ten levels by pressing on the right button at the right timing ! Challenge yourself and try to complete all levels !

  Colored Runner is one of my first prototype made with unity as part of studies.
